alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 6:51PM PDT until July 25 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by earlier excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Joshua Tree and Twentynine Palms in southern San Bernardino County. * WHEN...Until 845 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 PM PDT, A trained weather spotter reported minor flooding and ponding of water in the advisory area due to earlier brief heavy rainfall from thunderstorms. Heavy rainfall has ended but minor flooding is ongoing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... SR 62 between Yucca Valley and Twentynine Palms - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
